channel.title: The Ukulady – Los Angeles Visionaries Association

item.title: Serial Time for Tiny Humans!
item.dc:creator: The Ukulady
item.description: The Ukulady and her imaginary friend, Astrid Strudelman, the Unicorn Whisperer, host the kids show of the LA Storytelling Festival!  6 Amazing storytellers weave magical adventures and meep for tiny humans and handlers!  Featuring Astrid Strudelman, the Unicorn Whisperer, Heidi Swedberg, Don Black, Jackie Jones, Jayne Entwistle and Mista Cookie Jar!  At Santa Monica’s only […]
item.content:encoded: The Ukulady and her imaginary friend, Astrid Strudelman, the Unicorn Whisperer, host the kids show of the LA Storytelling Festival!  6 Amazing storytellers weave magical adventures and meep for tiny humans and handlers!  Featuring Astrid Strudelman, the Unicorn Whisperer, Heidi Swedberg, Don Black, Jackie Jones, Jayne Entwistle and Mista Cookie Jar!  At Santa Monica’s only bookstore geared for kids and their handlers!  Cookies, Snacks, Friends, Music, Stories!   Meep with us and bring the tiny humans in your life!

item.title: Echo Park Rising for Kids & Humans with The Ukulady & Friendsies!
item.dc:creator: The Ukulady
item.description: LAVA Visionary the Ukulady and her friends present an afternoon of free music, mirth, snacks and beverages suitable for all ages. Schedule of Performers: 1pm:  Michael Rayner:  the Man Spins a Cheeseburger on an Umbrella! 1:30: The Unicorn Whisperer & Monsiuer Senor Le Corndog! 2pm:  April Hava Shenkman 2:30pm:  The Ukulady & The Evil Sandwiches […]
item.content:encoded:
LAVA Visionary the Ukulady and her friends present an afternoon of free music, mirth, snacks and beverages suitable for all ages.

Schedule of Performers:

1pm:  Michael Rayner:  the Man Spins a Cheeseburger on an Umbrella!

1:30: The Unicorn Whisperer & Monsiuer Senor Le Corndog!

2pm:  April Hava Shenkman

2:30pm:  The Ukulady & The Evil Sandwiches DanceMusic Party

3:30pm:  Mista Cookie Jar & The Chocolate Chips DanceMusic Party

Delicious Snacks, Drinks, Friendsies & FREE Entertainment for Kids & Humans!

item.title: The Ukulady & Friendsies Free PartyShow for Kids and Humans
item.dc:creator: The Ukulady
item.description: The Ukulady & Friendsies return to Lot 1 for a FREE Kids MUSIC Variety Show!   On April 21st at 4pm, The Ukulady & The Evil Sandwiches play Hilarious songs for Kids & Humans!  With very special guests Mista Cookie Jar, Rob Blatt The Professional Dad & April Hava Shenkman!   Enjoy Snacks, Drinks & Entertainment!  For […]
item.content:encoded: The Ukulady & Friendsies return to Lot 1 for a FREE Kids MUSIC Variety Show!   On April 21st at 4pm, The Ukulady & The Evil Sandwiches play Hilarious songs for Kids & Humans!  With very special guests Mista Cookie Jar, Rob Blatt The Professional Dad & April Hava Shenkman!   Enjoy Snacks, Drinks & Entertainment!  For ALL AGES!

item.title: Kit’n’Tenders (The Ukulady & Gabby La La) at Lot 1
item.dc:creator: The Ukulady
item.description: Kit’n’Tenders, the musical duo of The Ukulady & Gabby La La (of Les Claypool’s Fancyband), reunite at Lot 1 in Echo Park This Sunday!   KT plays ukulele, toy accordion and sings in meeptastic harmony!   Enjoy an evening of wine, beer, incredible nibblies and delightful music with Kit’n’Tenders, Gabby’s band, Snow Angel, Hardly an Aviator, Laura […]
item.content:encoded: Kit’n’Tenders, the musical duo of The Ukulady & Gabby La La (of Les Claypool’s Fancyband), reunite at Lot 1 in Echo Park This Sunday!   KT plays ukulele, toy accordion and sings in meeptastic harmony!   Enjoy an evening of wine, beer, incredible nibblies and delightful music with Kit’n’Tenders, Gabby’s band, Snow Angel, Hardly an Aviator, Laura Serafine and Rachel Antony-Levine!   Toy Pianos, Toy Accordions, Sitar, Ukulele, & More!

item.title: The Ukulady at the Mentryville Music Fest
item.dc:creator: The Ukulady
item.description: The Ukulady & Friendsies, including The Ukulad on banjo & mandolin & Gabby La La on ukulele & toy accordion, will be playing at 3:45 at the first annual Mentryville Music Fest in Mentryville, CA!   This old pioneer ghost town is north of Santa Clarita and was used to shoot old cowboy movies!   Festival is […]
item.content:encoded: The Ukulady & Friendsies, including The Ukulad on banjo & mandolin & Gabby La La on ukulele & toy accordion, will be playing at 3:45 at the first annual Mentryville Music Fest in Mentryville, CA!   This old pioneer ghost town is north of Santa Clarita and was used to shoot old cowboy movies!   Festival is all day and night!  Hope to see you there!

item.title: The Ukulady & Friendsies PartyShowFun at Lot 1! Free Show for Kids & Humans!
item.dc:creator: The Ukulady
item.description: Musical Entertainer, The Ukulady and Lot 1 Cafe in Echo Park, are pleased to announce Monthly FREE Shows for Kids & Humans:  The Ukulady & Friendsies PartyShowFun at Lot 1!   Enjoy Wine & Beer for adults, Kid-Drinks for Kids, Snacks & the BEST GRILLED CHEESE in LA, all while being entertained by The Ukulady & […]
item.content:encoded: Musical Entertainer, The Ukulady and Lot 1 Cafe in Echo Park, are pleased to announce Monthly FREE Shows for Kids & Humans:  The Ukulady & Friendsies PartyShowFun at Lot 1!   Enjoy Wine & Beer for adults, Kid-Drinks for Kids, Snacks & the BEST GRILLED CHEESE in LA, all while being entertained by The Ukulady & Evil Sandwiches, plus Special Guests every show!  FREE!  Show starts at 4pm, doors open at 3:15!

item.title: To The Downfall of Evil Campaign!
item.dc:creator: The Ukulady
item.description: Contribute To The Downfall of Evil!  The Ukulady’s new Record for kids, humans, robots, puppets & woodland creatures of all ages!  www.Indiegogo.com/DownfallOfEvil The Ukulady has 60 days to raise funds for The Downfall of Evil! and donors recieve free gifts like handmade Ukulady crafts, the Ukulady live in Concert, custom Theme Songs & Jingles, The […]
item.content:encoded:
Contribute To The Downfall of Evil!  The Ukulady’s new Record for kids, humans, robots, puppets & woodland creatures of all ages! 

www.Indiegogo.com/DownfallOfEvil

The Ukulady has 60 days to raise funds for The Downfall of Evil! and donors recieve free gifts like handmade Ukulady crafts, the Ukulady live in Concert, custom Theme Songs & Jingles, The Ukulady hosting Craft Night for you and your friends & More!

To The Downfall of Evil!  Features music kids, parents, sullen-teens & child-free households will all enjoy!  Songs about Bird Moguls, Weebles, Flying Cars, Cobras, Unicorns, Robots & more!

Join the campaign To The Downfall of Evil!  Share with your friendsies!

item.title: The Ukulady at Maybe… A Musical Variety Show Where We Ask Big Questions…
item.dc:creator: The Ukulady
item.description: The Ukulady joins fellow LA Visionary, Eric Vollmer, of Public Works Improvisation Theatre, as well as performers Larry Hankin, Gary Gordon, Lee Boek, DJ Carlile, Doug Spitz and Kaitlin Ferrell for an evening of stories, music & Big Questions about the Cosmos!   At a delicious Polish eatery, Warszawa!  Join us and meep!
item.content:encoded: The Ukulady joins fellow LA Visionary, Eric Vollmer, of Public Works Improvisation Theatre, as well as performers Larry Hankin, Gary Gordon, Lee Boek, DJ Carlile, Doug Spitz and Kaitlin Ferrell for an evening of stories, music & Big Questions about the Cosmos!   At a delicious Polish eatery, Warszawa!  Join us and meep!

item.title: The Ukulady MC’s Venice SpringFling Musicfest!
item.dc:creator: The Ukulady
item.description: Come out to Venice Beach for the 1st annual Spring Fling Music Festival with your MC, The Ukulady!  Dozens of bands, artists, and friends!  All for free!  Hippie-it-up and celebrate Spring with The Ukulady & the Venice Spring Fling! WHEN:  Saturday, May 7th, 11am – 7pm WHERE:  Windward Plaza Park, Venice Beach, CA 902191 INFO: […]
item.content:encoded:
Come out to Venice Beach for the 1st annual Spring Fling Music Festival with your MC, The Ukulady!  Dozens of bands, artists, and friends!  All for free!  Hippie-it-up and celebrate Spring with The Ukulady & the Venice Spring Fling!

WHEN:  Saturday, May 7th, 11am – 7pm

WHERE:  Windward Plaza Park, Venice Beach, CA 902191

INFO: www.VeniceSpringFling.com

To The Downfall of Evil!

Love The Ukulady

www.TheUkulady.com

item.title: Kid-Crafting with The Ukulady in the OC!
item.dc:creator: The Ukulady
item.description: The Ukulady will be at the Orange County Marketplace in Costa Mesa, CA on Saturday, April 24th 9:30am – 11:30am hosting Eggcentric Crafts with the Easter Bunny!  $2.00, kids free!   The OC Marketplace is a flea market Party, complete with corndogs, stables of cute animals & tons of things to purchase, like socks, hats & […]
item.content:encoded: The Ukulady will be at the Orange County Marketplace in Costa Mesa, CA on Saturday, April 24th 9:30am – 11:30am hosting Eggcentric Crafts with the Easter Bunny!  $2.00, kids free!   The OC Marketplace is a flea market Party, complete with corndogs, stables of cute animals & tons of things to purchase, like socks, hats & produce!  Hope to see you there!
